settings.text: At AULA, we are committed to protecting your privacy and keeping your personal information secure. This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you visit our website or make a purchase from us.

settings.answer_1: When you visit our website or make a purchase from us, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, mailing address, phone number, and payment information. We use this information to process your order, communicate with you about your purchase, and provide you with updates about our products and services.
settings.answer_2: We use your personal information to process your orders and payments, communicate with you about your purchases, and provide you with updates about our products and services. We may also use your information to improve our website, track website usage, and personalize your experience.
settings.answer_3: We will never share, sell, or rent your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as required by law or to fulfill an order. We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who help us operate our website or fulfill orders.
settings.answer_4: We take the security of your personal information seriously and use industry-standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure.
settings.answer_5: You can choose not to provide us with certain information, but this may limit your ability to use our website or make purchases. You can also opt-out of receiving promotional emails by clicking on the unsubscribe link in any promotional email you receive from us.
settings.answer_6: We may update this privacy policy from time to time to reflect changes in our business practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any changes by posting the updated policy on our website.
settings.answer_7: If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us at support@aulagaming.com
